summary: A barber, murderer because of jealousy, spends twenty years in jail. He cannot, however adjust himself to a changed world and to the hypocracy of his own relatives and decides to return ... See full summary »
cast: Totò|Vera Molnar|Nyta Dover|Franca Faldini|Giacomo Rondinella|Leopoldo Trieste|Fernando Milani|Vincenzo Talarico|Eugenio Orlandi|Augusta Mancini|Maria Bon Roseto|Giacomo Gabrielli|Andrea Compagnoni|Thea Zubin|Ines Florentini|Ines Targas|Fred|Aronne|Mario Castellani|Ugo D'Alessio|Pasquale Fortunato|Fortunato Misiano|Nino Misiano|Pasquale Misiano
title: Dov'è la libertà...?
